description.value: You gain the appropriate ki spell for your School of Perfection: @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Unblinking Flame Revelation]{Unblinking Flame Revelation} for Unblinking Flame, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Unbreaking Wave Advance]{Unbreaking Wave Advance} for Unbreaking Waves, @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Unfolding Wind Rush]{Unfolding Wind Rush} for Unfolding Wind, or @UUID[Compendium.xprpg.spells-srd.Untwisting Iron Buffer]{Untwisting Iron Buffer} for Untwisting Iron. Increase the number of Focus Points in your focus pool by 1.
